title: Mix and Match Drill
goal: Build fluency by combining gismu, objects, and names freely.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Five-place klama review:

klama — x1 goes to x2 from x3 via x4 using x5

Translate: mi klama la zarci la zdani zo'e la karce

(Answer: I go to the market from home [via ?] by car.)

New Material (5-7 min)

Free Combination Practice

Today is about building automatic fluency. You'll take:

  • Any 3-place gismu from Week 4
  • Any object from Week 5
  • Any person name

And build complete sentences rapidly.

Your Building Blocks

Three-place gismu:

  • dunda (x1 gives x2 to x3)
  • cusku (x1 says x2 to x3)
  • benji (x1 sends x2 to x3)
  • lebna (x1 takes x2 from x3)
  • tavla (x1 talks to x2 about x3)

Week 5 objects:

  • cukta (book)
  • skami (computer)
  • stizu (chair)
  • jubme (table)
  • karce (car)

Locations:

  • kumfa (room)
  • dinju (building)
  • zarci (market)
  • zdani (home)

Names:

  • la .alis., la .bob., la .tam., la .meris.

Example Combinations

Gismu Object Person Sentence
dunda cukta .bob. mi dunda la cukta la .bob.
benji skami .alis. la .tam. cu benji la skami la .alis.
lebna stizu .meris. do lebna la stizu la .meris.
cusku (about) karce .bob. mi cusku ti la .bob.
tavla cukta .alis. mi tavla la .alis. la cukta

Rapid Fire Pattern

  1. Pick a gismu
  2. Pick an object (or use it as topic)
  3. Pick a person
  4. Build the sentence
  5. Say it aloud
  6. Repeat with different combinations

Key Point

Fluency comes from rapid combination. Don't think in English first — grab Lojban pieces and assemble them directly.

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Build Six Sentences

Use each gismu once with different objects/people:

  1. dunda + object + person → ?
  2. benji + object + person → ?
  3. lebna + object + person → ?
  4. cusku + ti/ta + person → ?
  5. tavla + person + topic → ?
  6. vecnu + object + person + price → ?
Example answers
  1. mi dunda la skami la .alis.
  2. la .bob. cu benji la cukta mi
  3. do lebna la stizu la .tam.
  4. mi cusku ti la .meris.
  5. la .alis. cu tavla la .bob. la karce
  6. mi vecnu la jubme do re mu

Exercise 2: Translation Challenge

Translate rapidly — don't pause:

  1. I give a computer to Alice.
  2. Bob sends a book to me.
  3. You take a car from Tom.
  4. Mary says this to you.
  5. I talk to Bob about the market.
  6. Alice sells a chair to me for 20.
Answers
  1. mi dunda la skami la .alis.
  2. la .bob. cu benji la cukta mi
  3. do lebna la karce la .tam.
  4. la .meris. cu cusku ti do
  5. mi tavla la .bob. la zarci
  6. la .alis. cu vecnu la stizu mi re no

Exercise 3: Create Your Own

Write 6 original sentences combining freely. Use at least 4 different gismu.

Example answers
  1. mi dunda la cukta la .tam.
  2. do benji la skami la .alis.
  3. la .bob. cu lebna la stizu mi
  4. mi tavla la .meris. la dinju
  5. la .alis. cu cusku ta la .bob.
  6. mi vecnu la karce la .tam. mu no no

items.text: I give a computer to Alice.
Bob sends a book to me.
You take a car from Tom.
I talk to Bob about the market.
Alice sells a chair to me for 20.
items.answer: `la .alis. cu vecnu la stizu mi re no`

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud without pausing:

  1. mi dunda la cukta la .bob. .i la .bob. cu gleki
  2. la .alis. cu benji la skami mi .i mi djica la skami
  3. do tavla mi la zarci .i mi klama la zarci

(I give a book to Bob. Bob is happy. / Alice sends a computer to me. I want a computer. / You talk to me about the market. I go to the market.)

Today's Vocab

No new vocabulary — focus on combination fluency.

Quick reference:

Gismu Pattern
dunda give X to Y
benji send X to Y
lebna take X from Y
cusku say X to Y
tavla talk to X about Y
vecnu sell X to Y for Z

Summary

You practiced rapid combination of gismu, objects, and names. Fluency comes from direct assembly in Lojban, not translation from English.
